data.lyric:
[ti:For Tonight]
[ar:Giveon]
[al:For Tonight]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]For Tonight - Giveon
[00:04.40]Lyrics by：Giveon
[00:08.80]Composed by：Giveon
[00:13.21]We've been done long before it all begun
[00:19.00]Still can't give it up
[00:22.31]
[00:25.01]Lead me on but leave before the morning comes
[00:30.28]Even thought it's what we want can't keep this up for long
[00:35.51]
[00:36.15]But I just I just don't wanna leave you
[00:39.22]Might just might just throw away the reasons
[00:42.09]Why we both can't lay here
[00:46.67]
[00:48.09]And secret secret both gotta keep it
[00:51.17]Honest honest that's just a game
[00:53.96]We know we both can't play
[00:59.04]
[00:59.67]For tonight I'm yours
[01:05.58]So deny the truth
[01:10.31]
[01:11.35]We'll stay behind closed doors
[01:16.46]'Cause all I wanna do is lie with you
[01:23.02]Even though it's wrong to lie with you
[01:28.61]
[01:31.25]We've become numb to what we know is wrong
[01:36.82]But no one knows but us
[01:40.57]
[01:42.88]The feelings rush every single time we touch
[01:48.33]Even though it's what we want can't keep this up for long
[01:54.23]But I just I just don't wanna leave you
[01:57.24]Might just might just throw away the reasons
[02:00.18]Why we both can't lay here
[02:06.01]And secret secret both gotta keep it
[02:09.17]Honest honest that's just a game
[02:11.95]We know know we both can't play
[02:17.15]
[02:17.65]For tonight I'm yours
[02:22.44]
[02:23.57]So deny the truth deny the truth
[02:29.37]We'll stay behind closed doors
[02:34.42]'Cause all I wanna do is lie with you
[02:40.38]
[02:41.76]For tonight I'm yours
[02:46.33]
[02:47.54]So deny the truth
[02:53.33]We'll stay behind closed doors
[02:58.70]'Cause all I wanna do is lie with you
[03:04.80]Even though it's wrong I'll lie with you
data.trans:
[ti:For Tonight]
[ar:Giveon]
[al:For Tonight]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.40]//
[00:08.80]//
[00:13.21]在一切开始之前 我们就已经结束
[00:19.00]仍然藕断丝连 无法一刀两断
[00:22.31]
[00:25.01]予我甜言蜜语 但你在清晨来临前就会离去
[00:30.28]尽管这是我们心之所向 但我们不能够坚持下去
[00:35.51]
[00:36.15]但我只是不想离你而去
[00:39.22]或许我会忘却所有理由
[00:42.09]为何我们不能相拥而眠
[00:46.67]
[00:48.09]我们得要保守秘密
[00:51.17]实话实说 这是一场爱情游戏
[00:53.96]我们深知我们无法参与其中
[00:59.04]
[00:59.67]因为今夜我属于你
[01:05.58]所以就忽略事实 否认我们的情感现状
[01:10.31]
[01:11.35]关上门扉 我们将会陪伴彼此
[01:16.46]因我只想与你相拥而眠
[01:23.02]尽管我这样做是不对的
[01:28.61]
[01:31.25]我们深知这是错误 但是我们已经变得麻木
[01:36.82]除了我们自己 无人知晓 
[01:40.57]
[01:42.88]每当我们触碰 内心情感汹涌
[01:48.33]尽管这是我们心之所向 但我们不能够坚持下去
[01:54.23]但我只是不想离你而去
[01:57.24]或许我会忘却所有理由
[02:00.18]为何我们不能相拥而眠
[02:06.01]我们得要保守秘密
[02:09.17]实话实说 这是一场爱情游戏
[02:11.95]我们深知我们无法参与其中
[02:17.15]
[02:17.65]因为今夜我属于你
[02:22.44]
[02:23.57]所以就忽略事实 否认我们的情感现状
[02:29.37]关上门扉 我们将会陪伴彼此
[02:34.42]因我只想与你相拥而眠
[02:40.38]
[02:41.76]因为今夜我属于你
[02:46.33]
[02:47.54]所以就忽略事实 否认我们的情感现状
[02:53.33]关上门扉 我们将会陪伴彼此
[02:58.70]因我只想与你相拥而眠
[03:04.80]即使这是一个错误 我会与你相拥而眠
